name: Ball Slinger
description: Ball Slinger is a game I made in 1 week as a challenge.  A ball is attached to your cursor via a chain/rope, and you need to defend your cursor from different enemies using your ball. ————————————————— There are 4 types of enemies: 1. ⌊ Red ⌉ Speed = 100 Size = Normal ————————————————— 2. ⌊ Yellow ⌉ Speed = 150  Size = Small ————————————————— 3. ⌊ Green ⌉ Speed = 200 Size = Big ————————————————— 4. ⌊ Blue ⌉ Note: After getting hit first time the Blue enemy will change his phase. After getting hit a second time, he will die. ■ Phase 1 ■ Speed = 50 Size = Big ————————————————— □ Phase 2 □ Speed = 200   Size = Big
